resources.string:
Warm-up A

3 rounds, 30 seconds each
Jumping Jacks
Instep Stretch
Arm Circles(forward+back,small+big)
Trunk Rotation(right+left)

Warm-up B

3 rounds, 30 seconds each
Steam Engine
Trunk Rotation
Foam Roll It Band and Quads (if possible)

Warm-up C

(Cardio Warm-up) 4 rounds
5x BW Squat
5x Multi-direction Leg Swing
5x Alternate Lunge(each Leg)
10x Superman Back Extension\n10x Two Count Flutter Kick

12x Alternate Lunge(6 each leg)
6x Plank Walk-up
6x Lateral Lunge
6x Plank Walk-up

Burpee @ 30 seconds
Rest @ 30 seconds
BW Squat @ 30 seconds
Rest @ 30 seconds
Burpee @ 30 seconds
Rest @ 30 seconds
Iso Squat Hold @ 30 seconds
6x Bird Dog (each side)\n6x Superman Back Extension

Run at least 30 minutes
 Use a walk, job technique if needed
(jog until you need a break, then walk as needed, repeate for 30 minutes

Look to build up your mileage over time;
do not push too far too fast

If you can go 30 minutes try a 5k
If 5k is easy do a 10k

Cool down @ 10 minute easy jog, static stretching

5x Push-up
10x Alternate Lunch(5 each leg)
5x Windmill Push-up
10x Jump Squat
5x Wide Hands Push-up
10x Two Count Flutter Kick
5x Close Hands Push-up
10x Tip-over(5x each leg)
Complete this circuit as many times as you can in 20 minutes

Mountain Climber @ 60 seconds
Rest @ 30 seconds
BW Squat @ 60 seconds
Rest @ 30 seconds
Side Plank Hold - Right @ 60 seconds
Rest @ 30 seconds
 Side Plank Hold - Left @ 60 seconds

24x BW Squat
24x Alternate Lunge(12x each leg)
12x Jump Squat
12x Jump Lunge(6x each leg)

8-10 x 400m run @ max effort (400m = one lap around a regulation track or 1/4 of a mile)

Rest time is equal to time taken to complete 400m or less

Cool down @ 10 min easy jog, static stretching

5x Alternate Lunge
10x Plank Walk-up
15x BW Squat
20x Mountain Climber
25x Sit-up
6x Bird Dog(each side)\n12x Superman Back Extension\n24x Jumping Jack

5x Push-up
10x Alternate Lunge
5x Incline Push-up
10x Lateral Lunge
5x Decline Push-up
10x Tip-over
Plank Hold @ max hold\nSide Plank Right @ max hold\nSide Plank Left @ max hold

10-12x Hill Springs
Find a steep hill that takes 60-90 seconds to climb

Run @ Max Effort
Walk/easy jog to start

Repeat

Cool down @ 10 min easy jog, static stretching
5x Dive Bomb Push-up\n10x Alternate Lunge\n20x Two Count Flutter Kick
5x Plank Walk-up\n10x Reverse Lunge\n20x Superman Back Extension
6x Knee to Elbow Push-up(each side)\n12x Split Squat(each leg)\n24x Bird Dog(12 each side)

Burpee
Plank Hold
Sit-up
Side Plank Right Side
Push-up
Side Plank Left Side

Run @ 5 minutes
25x BW Squats
Run @ 5 minutes
25x Jump Squats
Run @ 5 minutes
25x Jump Luinge(total)
Run @ 5 minutes
 25x Push-up

If possible repeate up to 3 times

Cool down @ 10 minutes with easy jog, static stretching
Staggered Hand Push-up @ 30 seconds\nJump Squat @ 30 seconds
Two Count Flutter Kick @ 60 seconds\nIn and Out @ 60 seconds

12x Burpee
Side Plank Right Side @ 60 seconds
BW Squat
Side Plank Left Side @ 60 seconds

6x Split Squat each leg
24x Leg Raise
6x Tip-over each leg
24x sit-up

5x Windmill Push-up(each arm)
25x Jumping Jack
5x Wide Hands Push-up
25x Mountain CLimber
5x Close Hands Push-up
6x Bird Dog(each side)\n12x Superman Back Extension\n24x Leg Raise

6x Alternate Lunge(each leg)
12x BW Squat
12x Jump Lunge(each leg)
24x Jump Squat

6x Dive Bomb Push-up
Side Plank Right Side @ 60 seconds
12x Push-up
Side Plank Left Side @ 60 seconds
24x Flutter Kick

Run at least 30 minutes

Use a walk/jog technique if needed
(jog until you need a break, then walk as needed, repeat for 30 minutes

Look to build up your mileage over time;
do not push too far too fast

If you can go 30 minutes try a 5K
If you can do a 5K, do a 10K

Cool down @ 10 min easy jog, static stretching
10x Plank Walk-up\n20x BW Squat\n20x Leg Raise
5x Staggered Hand Push-up(each hand)\n5x Split Squat(each leg)\n20x In and Out
40x Mountain Climber\n10x Lateral Lunge(each leg)\nPlank Hold @ 60 seconds

Knee to Elbow Push-up
Jumping Jack
Leg Raise
Alternate Lunge
Superman Back Extension
Reverse Lunge

Windmill Push-up
Alternate Lunge
Jumping Jack
Reverse Lunge
Two count Flutter Kick
Bird Dog

10x Dive Bomb Push-up
20x In and Out
10x Alternate Lunge(each leg)
20x Leg Raise
10x Plank Walk-up
20x Sit-up
10x BW Squat
20x Two Count Flutter Kick

Mile Repeats

2-4x one mile repeate @ max effor

Walk/jog recovery equal to the time taken to complete the mile run

Cool down @ 10 min easy jog, static stretching
